title: 'Midnight Rider' Director Gets Two-Year Sentence In Camera Assistant's Death
teaser: NPR's Scott Simon talks with the Los Angeles Times' Richard Verrier about Sarah Jones, who died on the Midnight Rider set. Director Randall Miller will serve two years for involuntary manslaughter.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
